room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: We took some younger kids here for a birthday experience and they absolutely loved the Haunted Mansion theme. It was pretty challenging for them but they had a blast. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: We did the Mystery Mansion game, and it was great! Difficult, but we did manage to escape! Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: This was by far the most fun I've had in a while. It was my first time and we cose the Mystery Mansion. Overall perfect. I will be returning for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: I love Escape rooms but this one wasn't that impressive. We did Mystery Mansion. There were quite a few things broken or the guy would come over the intercom, telling us that we wouldn't need something and not to touch it. The workers didn't seem to be into it at all so that didn't help us get excited. We did get out and it was fun, just not as impressed as I usually am at escape rooms. This was our first time at Breakout Games and it was my twin sister's and my birthday.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: I had the best time! And Kelly was an awesome game master! I will definitely recommend you to others and I hope to come back soon!
